function NPC_110014:OnSpawn( Spawn ) local NPCID_HOUNTER = 110035 local Pos = this:GetPos() local Field = this:GetField() local Pet = Field:Spawn( NPCID_HOUNTER, Pos ) this:SetTarget( Pet ) Pet:SetTarget( this ) end
function NPC_110014:OnAggro( Target ) local Pet = this:GetTarget() if Pet == nil or Pet:IsNull() or Pet:IsDead() then return end
AsNPC(Pet):Assist( this ) end
